name: MOTEL SNOOZE
description:
Is a dream exploration game developed during Dream Diary Jam 4.  This is a very VERY small taste of what I have planned for this game, as I ran clean out of time while making this entry.  What is in this version more or less is an example of how the game progresses and what I've been wanting to do with a dream exploration type game for quite a while.  It's not quite as traditional as my previous Yume Nikki fangames!

I hope you do enjoy what is here! I apologize for any errors or glitches you may encounter. There was so much to do with the little time provided!

(Really quick unprofessional Guide: there is a door in the main motel room that will show your progress but it's only available after the intro)*
